death.attack.chesed_lor_attack: %s was turned into a book by %s
death.attack.chesed_ba_attack: %s couldn't handle an army of robots
death.attack.chesed_falling_block: %s lost its head to a boulder
death.attack.chesed_falling_block.player: %s lost its head to a boulder
effect_description.fdbosses.chesed_energ:
Chesed ray attack deals 0 damage to targets that have this effect.

When that target is hit with ray attack reduce the effect level by 1. Remove the effect if ray reflector was also hit.

Players with this effect charge nearby ray reflectors.
effect_description.minecraft.night_visio:
Just a regular night vision.

Allows to see in the dark like its day.
effect_description.fdbosses.shocked: Decreases outcoming damage by a set percentage.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.crystals_descript:
Casts this ability before the lightning ray attack.

Destroys all crystals and then summons 1 crystal on each side of the battlefield.

If a crystal is destroyed by a player, that player becomes {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:chesed_energized,level=1}}.
fdbosses.bosses.description.chesed:
A creature born out of rocks corroded by sculk. Wields enormous magic power.

§cRecommended weapon type: {{(fdlib:item)item=minecraft:diamond_axe}}
fdbosses.skills.chesed.mightiness_descri:
Chesed cannot be hurt directly and its arena cannot be easily escaped from.

All damage inflicted by Chesed cannot be lowered by any resistances.

Gives all combatants {{(fdbosses:effect)id=minecraft:night_vision}} while alive.

If a player looks away from Chesed, that player is inflicted with {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:chesed_gaze}}.

Chesed proceeds to second phase when hp drop below 50%.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.blocks_descriptio: Tears out blocks from the earth and hurls them onto target.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.earthquake_descri:
Slams the earth emitting a shockwave and lightnings that travel out from Chesed position.

During second phase more lightnings are summoned and their movement speed is increased.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.espheres_descript:
Releases ball lightnings that travel out from Chesed.

These ball lightnings cannot be reflected.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.monoliths_descrip:
Spawns 4 monoliths when summoned. 

Monoliths deactivate upon death and cannot be damaged anymore.

Monoliths gain additional {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=chesedConfig, value=additionalSecondPhaseMonolithHP}} HP on second phase.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.roll_description:
Rolls around the arena damaging and pushing away everyone who step in its way. 

During second phase leaves a fire trail behind.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.rockfall_descript:
Fires lightning beam at the ceiling causing it to crumble while summoning lightnings around combatants. 

During second phase amount and frequency of lightnings are increased.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.lightning_ray_des:
Casts Crystals ability before this ability and then begins to fire lightning rays with tremendous power at target. 

Lightning ray deals 0 damage to targets affected by {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:chesed_energized}}.

If a target is a charged ray reflector Chesed takes 1 damage.

During second phase the frequency of attacks is increased.

§lTip!§r

While charging the attack, Chesed tries to aim slightly beyond the target movement and stops aiming moments before releasing the lightning ray.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.final_description:
Drains power from monoliths and then unleashes a lightning strike that damage everyone on the battlefield. 

Amount of damage depends on how many monoliths are in an active state. 

While Chesed casts this ability, monoliths are invulnerable. 

Deactivated monoliths become active again after this ability ends.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.final_stats:
Attack: 
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_damage}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=chesedConfig, value=finalAttackDamagePercentPerMonolith}}% Max HP per active monolith.
fdbosses.word.stop_it: Stop it. Bosses do have feelings too, you know.
fdbosses.word.you_are_getting_on_my_nerv: You are starting to get on my nerves.
fdbosses.word.consequences: You will soon face the consequences of your own actions.
fdbosses.word.killed_chesed_in_screen: Well, you killed him. Congratulations! I hope you feel bad about yourself for killing an innocent creature! You know, i wanted to crash the game but that would be a bad game design, so i will leave that decision to you. Here, press that button.
fdbosses.drops.chesed.lightning_core_des:
A core that Chesed draws its power from. 

Can be applied to any weapon in crafting table. 

When attacking entities with a weapon that is enhanced with Lightning Core there is a chance to summon a ghost of your weapon that will attack the target and deal a set percentage of your weapon damage while inflicting {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:shocked}}.
fdbosses.drops.chesed.lightning_core_sta:
Shock:
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_damage}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=effectConfig, value=shockDamageReductionPercent}}% outgoing damage reduction.
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_duration}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=itemConfig, value=flyingSwordShockDuration}} ticks.

Ghost weapon: 
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_damage}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=itemConfig, value=flyingSwordDamagePercent}}% of weapon damage.

Summon chance:  {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=itemConfig, value=chanceToSummonFlyingSword}}%
fdbosses.skills.chesed.electrified_air_d: Air above Chesed crackles with power. Entities that interact with it are damaged.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.electrified_air_s:
Air: 
{{(fdlib:image)path=fdbosses:boss_damage}}: {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=chesedConfig, value=electrifiedAirCurrentHealthDamagePercent}}% current HP.

Instantly kills affected entity if HP is lower than  {{(fdbosses:config_float) config=chesedConfig, value=electrifiedAirInstadeathHP}}.
fdbosses.skills.chesed.kinetic_field_des:
Uses this attack only on second phase.

Traps players in a kinetic field that doesn't allow them to escape.

Periodically summons lightnings in all kinetic fields.
fdbosses.word.didnt_read_skills: It is highly advised to read boss skill descriptions before the fight. Do you really wish to start the fight now?
fdbosses.drops.chesed.trophy_description: A trophy of Chesed to showcase your heroic deeds
fdbosses.word.tried_to_break_arena: An evil force prevents you from corrupting this place.
fdbosses.tldr.chesed:
Chesed damage pierces armor and shields.

To damage Chesed:

Wait until lightning ray attack, kill a crystal with an axe to get {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:chesed_energized,level=1}}, run to a ray reflector and make Chesed hit it. You are immune to lightning ray attack when you are {{(fdbosses:effect)id=fdbosses:chesed_energized}}.

Chesed has an attack which damage depends on the amount of active monoliths, if all monoliths are active - there is no way to survive the attack. To deactivate a monolith - kill it.
